inputs.name: pathtozip
inputs.label: Archive Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the archive being used to deploy to Apprenda.

inputs.name: alias
inputs.label: Applicaton Alias
inputs.helpMarkDown: Application alias. Aliases must not contain spaces and must be unique to the platform, and only use DNS-entry-safe characters.

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Application description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description of the application for display in operator and developer portals.

inputs.name: versionName
inputs.label: Version Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version display name. May include spaces and other DNS-incompatible characters

inputs.name: retainScalingSettings
inputs.label: Retain Instance Count
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this if you want to keep the published instance's scaling definition instead of the Platform Default

inputs.name: versionPrefix
inputs.label: Version Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the prefix for the version alias. This integration will increment the version number as new versions of the app are deployed.

inputs.name: stage
inputs.label: Target Deployment Stage
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the desired stage of deployment. Values can be either definition, sandbox, or published.

inputs.name: cloudurl
inputs.label: Apprenda Cloud URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the base cloud URL that is used to connect to ACP.

inputs.name: ignoreCertificateValidation
inputs.label: Ignore Certificate Validation Errors
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this if certificate validation errors should be ignored, for example if your Apprenda Cloud Platform instance uses a self-signed certificate.

inputs.name: clouduser
inputs.label: Apprenda Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the username that is used to connect to ACP.

inputs.name: cloudpw
inputs.label: Apprenda Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the password that is used to connect to ACP.

inputs.name: clouddevteam
inputs.label: Apprenda Development Team
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the development team alias that is used to connect to ACP.

inputs.name: forcenewversion
inputs.label: Force a New Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this if you want to force a new version each time a deployment is generated.

description: This task deploys your application onto ACP
author: Apprenda
helpMarkDown: Deploys an application archive to an Apprenda Cloud instance
name: ApprendaDeploy
